name: Loatin
description:
Story

Discover the mythical Loatins and face the challenges of the underground with your friends ! Your teamwork and reflexes will be tested during this actionpacked free falling adventure. How DEEP will you go ? Some things might be watching for you…

This game was intended mostly for local multiplayer with gamepads, for up to 3 players ! (You can use softwares like Parsec to play online co-op)


Controls
  • Move with the left joystick.
  • Wall jump with the A button.
  • Get close to a friend to link your Loatins.
  • You move faster while linked.
  • While linked you can dash to your friends by pressing your left trigger (LT) if they are to your left, and right trigger (RT) if they are to your right.
  • Most enemies die if they touch your link.
  • Obstacles will break your link.
  • You loose a live if you get hit and become invulnerable for a short time.
  • Lives are shared between players, if you run out of lives the game ends.
  • Collect crystal shards to regain lives.
